subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Rollins of the Phillies was not shy about comparing himself with the Mets’ Jose Reyes, another switch-hitting shortstop on the verge of free agency.
snippet: Jimmy Rollins of the Phillies was not shy about comparing himself with the Mets’ Jose Reyes, another switch-hitting shortstop on the verge of free agency.
